document_data.name: Spike
document_data.mainbody: '''Spikes''' were large metal rods that were pointed at one end (essentially giant [[nail]]s), used in carpentry, construction, and adventuring. They belonged to a class of hardware that also included [[Bolt (fastener)|bolts]] and [[peg]]s, and were very similar to [[piton]]s.
document_data.Description:
Spikes were most often between {{SIAdj|6|inch|c|long=yes}} and {{SIAdj|12|inch|c|long=yes}} long, made from [[iron]] with a square cross-section. Depending on their purpose they could be made with a simple flattened head, or with an eyehole for looping a [[rope]], [[carabiner]], or some other device.

Aside from bolts, nails, and pegs, spikes also had a resemblance to [[stake]]s.
document_data.Availability:
Nails were made by blacksmiths as part of their regular work.

''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' offered a selection of spikes and related tools. Spikes could be had in {{SIAdj|6|inch|c|long=yes}} (3 [[gp]]/dozen) and {{SIAdj|12|inch|c|long=yes}} (5 gp/dozen) lengths.

Usage.Magic:
''[[Hold monster]]'' used a metal rod as a [[material component]], such as a nail or spike.

The ''[[statue]]'' spell could be cast using a mixture of [[Lime (material)|lime]], [[sand]], and water stirred by an iron nail or spike.
